nodes.title: üé¨ PROFESSIONAL T2V PIPELINE v2.0 - MASTER CONTROL PANEL
widgets_values:
# Professional Text-to-Video Pipeline

## üî• PRESET CONFIGURATIONS

### ‚ö° QUALITY PRESETS
| Preset | Resolution | Frames | Steps | LoRA | Upscale | Time | VRAM |
|--------|------------|--------|-------|------|---------|------|------|
| üöÄ Draft | 512x320 | 33 | 2 | 0.5 | None | ~30s | 15GB |
| ‚öñÔ∏è Standard | 832x480 | 81 | 4 | 0.4 | None | ~5min | 25GB |
| üíé Quality | 832x480 | 97 | 6 | 0.3 | 1.5x | ~12min | 30GB |
| üé¨ Production | 1280x720 | 129 | 8 | 0.3 | 2x | ~30min | 45GB |
| üëë Cinema | 1280x720 | 161 | 10 | 0.25 | 2x | ~45min | 48GB |

nodes.title: üìù PROMPT ENGINEERING GUIDE
widgets_values:
## Professional Prompt Structure

```
[STYLE] [SUBJECT] [APPEARANCE] [ACTION]
[ENVIRONMENT] [LIGHTING] [CAMERA] [QUALITY]
```

---

### üé¨ CINEMATIC TEMPLATE
```
Cinematic shot of [subject] [action].
[Environment description]. [Time of day].
[Camera movement]. Film grain, 
anamorphic lens, shallow depth of field,
professional color grading.
```

### üé® ARTISTIC TEMPLATE
```
[Art style] depicting [subject] [action].
[Mood/atmosphere]. [Color palette].
[Movement description]. Dramatic lighting,
stylized, award-winning composition.
```

### üìπ COMMERCIAL TEMPLATE
```
Professional [product/subject] showcase.
[Key features]. [Setting]. Clean studio
lighting, smooth rotation, premium feel,
4K quality, commercial grade.
```

---

### üí° PRO TIPS
1. Start with style/mood keywords
2. Be specific about subject details
3. Describe motion explicitly
4. Include camera movement
5. End with quality keywords

nodes.title: üé• MOTION & CAMERA DICTIONARY
widgets_values:
## Subject Motion Keywords

| Intensity | Keywords |
|-----------|----------|
| Subtle | `slight movement, gentle sway, breathing, blinking` |
| Moderate | `walking, turning, flowing, dancing, gesturing` |
| Dynamic | `running, jumping, exploding, flying, rapid motion` |
| Fluid | `morphing, transforming, melting, dissolving` |

---

## Camera Movement Keywords

| Type | Keywords | Effect |
|------|----------|--------|
| Static | `locked shot, tripod, fixed camera` | Stability |
| Pan | `pan left/right, horizontal sweep` | Reveal |
| Tilt | `tilt up/down, vertical movement` | Scale |
| Dolly | `dolly in/out, push in, pull back` | Intimacy |
| Track | `tracking shot, follow shot` | Action |
| Orbit | `orbit, revolve, 360 rotation` | Showcase |
| Crane | `crane up/down, aerial descent` | Drama |
| Handheld | `handheld, shaky cam` | Urgency |
| Steadicam | `steadicam, smooth glide` | Flow |

---

## Cinematic Techniques
```
rack focus, depth of field, lens flare,
bokeh, motion blur, time-lapse,
slow motion, speed ramp, whip pan
```

nodes.title: üîß MODEL & LORA TOOLKIT
widgets_values:
## Speed LoRA Settings
| Strength | Speed | Quality |
|----------|-------|--------|
| 0.3 | ~6min | Best |
| 0.4 | ~4min | Great ‚≠ê |
| 0.5 | ~3min | Good |
| 0.6+ | ~2min | Draft |

---

## Style LoRA Usage
**Currently DISABLED**

**To Enable:**
1. Right-click ‚Üí Mode ‚Üí Always
2. Select your LoRA file
3. Set strength (0.5-0.8)
4. Add trigger words!

---

## Multiple LoRAs
```
Speed + Style1 + Style2
  0.4     0.6      0.4
= Combined effect
```

**‚ö†Ô∏è Total strength matters!**
Reduce if artifacts appear.

nodes.title: ‚úèÔ∏è STAGE 2: MAIN PROMPT
widgets_values: Cinematic shot of a majestic dragon soaring through dramatic storm clouds at twilight. Lightning illuminates its iridescent scales as it breathes fire. Rain and embers swirl around. Epic tracking shot following the dragon's flight. Hyper-detailed, film grain, anamorphic lens flare, professional color grading, blockbuster quality, 8K resolution.

nodes.title: üö´ NEGATIVE PROMPT (Extended)
widgets_values: blurry, low quality, pixelated, distorted, deformed, ugly, bad anatomy, extra limbs, missing limbs, floating limbs, disconnected limbs, mutation, mutated, disfigured, disgusting, watermark, text, logo, signature, static, frozen, jittery, flickering, duplicate frames, frame jumping, temporal artifacts, compression artifacts, noise, grain, overexposed, underexposed, washed out, oversaturated, amateur, unprofessional

nodes.title: üìê DIMENSION PRESETS
widgets_values:
## Quick Copy Presets

**üé¨ YouTube/Standard (16:9)**
`832 x 480` or `1280 x 720`

**üì± TikTok/Reels (9:16)**
`480 x 832` or `720 x 1280`

**üì∑ Instagram (1:1)**
`512 x 512` or `768 x 768`

**üé• Cinematic (21:9)**
`896 x 384`

---

**Frame Presets:**
- 2 sec = 33 frames
- 5 sec = 81 frames ‚≠ê
- 8 sec = 129 frames
- 10 sec = 161 frames

nodes.title: üé≤ SAMPLER PRESETS
widgets_values:
## Quality Presets

**üöÄ Draft Mode**
```
steps: 2 | cfg: 1
sampler: uni_pc | scheduler: simple
```

**‚öñÔ∏è Standard Mode** ‚≠ê
```
steps: 4 | cfg: 1
sampler: uni_pc | scheduler: simple
```

**üíé Quality Mode**
```
steps: 6 | cfg: 1
sampler: dpmpp_2m | scheduler: karras
```

**üëë Cinema Mode**
```
steps: 8-10 | cfg: 1
sampler: dpmpp_2m | scheduler: karras
```

---

**üí° Seed Management:**
- `randomize` = Explore
- `fixed` = Reproduce
- Note seeds you like!

nodes.title: üîç UPSCALE TOOLKIT
widgets_values:
**Currently DISABLED**

**To Enable:**
Right-click ‚Üí Mode ‚Üí Always

**Scale Factors:**
- 1.5x = 50% larger
- 2.0x = Double size
- 4.0x = Quadruple (slow!)

**Methods:**
- `lanczos` = Best quality ‚≠ê
- `bilinear` = Faster
- `nearest` = Pixelated look

**‚ö†Ô∏è Higher = More VRAM + Time**

nodes.title: üíæ OUTPUT SETTINGS
widgets_values:
**Output Locations:**
```
ComfyUI/output/pro_t2v/video/
ComfyUI/output/pro_t2v/animation/
```

**Format Comparison:**
| Format | Size | Quality | Looping |
|--------|------|---------|--------|
| MP4 | Small | Great | Manual |
| WebP | Medium | Good | Auto ‚≠ê |

nodes.title: üõ†Ô∏è TROUBLESHOOTING & TIPS
widgets_values:
## Common Issues & Fixes

| Problem | Solution |
|---------|----------|
| Blurry output | Steps ‚Üë 6-8, LoRA ‚Üì 0.3 |
| Wrong subject | More specific prompt |
| No motion | Add action verbs |
| Shaky/jittery | LoRA ‚Üì 0.3-0.35 |
| Out of memory | Resolution ‚Üì, Frames ‚Üì |
| Artifacts | Improve negative prompt |
| Too slow | LoRA ‚Üë 0.5, Steps ‚Üì 2 |
| Colors wrong | Add color keywords |

---

## Pro Workflow Tips

1. **Test Fast:** 512x320, 33f, 2 steps
2. **Iterate Prompts:** Find what works
3. **Lock Seed:** When happy, fix seed
4. **Scale Up:** Increase res/frames
5. **Final Polish:** Enable upscale

---

## Batch Processing
Queue multiple prompts by:
1. Change prompt
2. Click Queue
3. Repeat

All jobs run sequentially!

nodes.title: üéØ EXAMPLE PROMPTS
widgets_values:
**Copy & Modify These:**

üêâ Fantasy: `Cinematic dragon soaring through storm clouds, breathing fire, lightning, epic tracking shot, 8K`

üåä Nature: `Massive ocean wave crashing in slow motion, golden sunset, foam spray, drone shot rising, documentary`

üë§ Portrait: `Fashion model walking runway, flowing dress, dramatic spotlight, slow motion, commercial quality`

üöó Action: `Sports car drifting around corner, tire smoke, neon city lights, tracking shot, cinematic`
